statement.partone: We are Beehive. We tell your brand's story
statement.partfour: Short and sweet - we are buzzing across all digital platforms which you need.

aboutUs.title: storytelling
aboutUs.text: One of the oldest skills of mankind to date. A good story satisfies our need for community, exchange, and understanding. our team of highly qualified professionals / (‚Äúbees‚Äù buzz to) create and build bridges which connect businesses to the needs of potential and existing customers.

digital.title: digital marketing strategy
digital.description: Producing content and running ads is our greatest love, but it the final step to a comprehensive digital marketing strategy. We develop, produce and execute your story to get what you need. We do it with our hearts, knowledge and numbers.

social.title: social media marketing
social.description: We recreate the digital reality of your business to make your story count. Whether you are after brand awareness, sales or presentation, we will make sure your story is heard, remembered and spread.

content.title: content production
content.description: The good thing about having approximately 50 years of combined experience in the industry is that we have cherry picked the best photographers and videographers to write your story visually. For every budget range ‚Äî we got you.

design.title: design
design.description: Do you know what visual identity, great design and brand identity have in common? Top of the game design team, applying art to everyday life. To them, every detail matters.

development.title: web & app development
development.description: A heart for code, an eye for detail and a nose for improvement.

team.title: our team
team.description: Each hive member, having many years of experience in their professional field, helps to contribute to our Beehive in a multitude of ways. Like bees - we work together to produce a great honey jar of knowledge, creativity and discipline.

andjela.title: Anhel, 26 years of buzzing

aboutBeehive.title: about beehive
aboutBeehive.description:
A strong and healthy bee colony can pollinate up to three million flowers in one day. Same here, applied to digital.

Us personally. Not these new robots.

about.partone: Prana is a family fusion restaurant, founded in 2022. A fun idea for a restaurant, to be community-oriented, to carry the spirit of Italy, but also Hawaiian exoticism. The idea behind this bright place at Hilandarska 6 and Kneginje Zorka 28 two years later is to serve food that increases life energy.
about.parttwo: It is true, that food is very seductive in terms of marketing because it is inextricably linked with emotions, but the question arises: how to tell a tender, family story; make everyone feel at home; create an environment in which Prana is a favorite place in the neighborhood, which, along with an exceptional food offer, can also bring a ray of sunshine?
about.partthree: This is exactly the story we were tasked to tell.

title.partone: How to precisely mirror someone's vision through content?

challenge.description: By creating content that is adequate for social networks, and based on the wishes and creative vision of the client, we have created a visual and communication tone that mirrors exactly what is inside Prana. With a carefully designed strategy, content testing, and listening to the audience, we achieved excellent results and successfully responded to the business challenge.

title.main: How to start telling this story?
title.subtitle: Approach

solution.description: We organized a pre-opening event for friends of the house - influencers, actors, friends, and partners, they got a glimpse of what Prana will look like - through small bites of selected dishes, wine, friendly and family gathering, one spring Sunday morning. Before the bar opened, Prana already had 1000 organic followers, from the event itself and the announcement of something completely new and unique.

highlight.subtitle: About Bistro
highlight.title: Tell a whole story in one sentence

about.text: Belgrade Hometown bar and restaurant. Located in the heart of Belgrade, in Uzun Mirkova no. 5. The personification of an urban lifestyle. These are people who like to have fun, socialize, and throw amazing parties. Their menu is diverse, as is the clientele, there are many easter eggs in the bar itself, and there are a million ways they can be communicated on social media. So, how can we extract the essence of this place and present it as best as possible on digital channels?

title.partone: Build on the existing identity and tell the Bistro story in a fun, interactive, and exciting way.

challenge.description: We know that it is in the center of Belgrade, but the Bistro is a center in itself. A place where everything is possible, where fresh orange juice can be served at midnight, and a bottle of wine with breakfast. Where meat puree is made from chestnuts, bread according to Zuza's recipe, and the soup is said to be an actual medicine. The team that works has a lot of life experience, nice manners, amazing smiles, and good taste. A real modern inn, one would conclude from the eclectic interior, but still, it's not that - it can't really be caught just like that. Parties are not planned, they happen. And they happen. Bistro is Belgrade itself in a one corner of the Old Town - Belgrade in the right way.

title.main: How did we respond to the task?
title.subtitle: Approach

solution.description:
We created a digital, imperfect Bistro reality program. We showed what happens when a dish is ordered, we captured moments of fun, laughter, and interesting stories. We introduced the audience to the employees and their character, we created the ambiance and a little more than that - we showed how different members of society sit in the same place, how synergy is achieved, how a party is created, how fresh food is arranged and what happens when the working hours' ring on Fridays. We did not invite people, but we conveyed to them the atmosphere, which they gladly wanted to become a part of. Everyone wants to be on the Bistro Instagram profile, and that's our biggest success.

We also improved communications through copywriting, which we wrote in an imaginative, fairy-tale way, sometimes inspired by anecdotes, and sometimes by urban legends.

about.text: ZLA-ZLA is the biggest CBD shop in the Balkans. We're not kidding when we say the biggest. They have over 4000 products on their e-commerce site, have been around since 2004, and not only do they have CBD products, but they also have streetwear. This is a needle-to-locomotive story, with an urban attitude and a reputation that is very well known.

first.title: 1. Reach a younger audience.
first.description: All old-school fans of underground hip-hop culture know about Zla Shtek. And what about the Gen Z population?

second.title: 2. Present the entire range of products in an informative but also appealing way.
second.description: In other words - to maintain the brand's coolness, while constantly informing the audience about what's in stock, what's on sale, how to order products online, etc.

challenge.description: Important information - social media does not allow advertising for CBD products so we achieved all results organically.

title.main: How did we respond to the task?
title.subtitle: Approach

description.partone: 1. TikTok. We translated ZLA-ZLA's communication to the language of TikTok. We opened an account, and as we started the content, it seemed like everyone was waiting for Zla-Zla to get here. In just a few months we reached 10K followers, our posts went viral, and people were asking about the products. But unfortunately, we have no proof of this because our account was banned for violating TikTok guidelines. In any case, we achieved what we wanted - the presence on this platform led to an increase in foot traffic both in the store itself, as well as in orders on the website - we introduced the Zla brand to the Gen Z population.
description.parttwo: 2. Here we followed up on the first task. We used a TikTok-like format to display all informative news on the Instagram profile as well. Through short feed and story posts that are either well-designed or recorded in a direct way that is currently popular, we provided the audience with subtle information, while maintaining the brand's reputation.

ending.title: Why did we stop cooperating?
ending.description: The recommendation for every client who has such a huge assortment in a specific industry is to start in-house work at some point. That's why ZLA-ZLA continued working on social media in-house, and we stop by sometimes for coffee and consultations.
